name: Myrio Solution
overview:
Myrio Solution is a personal digital shopping assistant that MAXIMIZES SALES VOLUME and INCREASES CUSTOMER SATISFACTION & BRAND LOYALTY by solving in-store customers’ needs.

Based on item’s label reading the Myrio software solution offers smart matching suggestions for outfit combinations and accessories providing a regular update of items, combinations and quantities.

Myrio is the right solution for mono or multi brand retail stores, department stores and wholesale. It offers a combination of in-store, mobile and web applications providing integrated customer centric service.
